title: I built an Xbox inside a PS5!
description: Learn more about the ROG Strix XG43UQ HDMI 2.1 gaming monitor:  I "improved" a PS5 with an Xbox Series S.  A closer look at the PSBox over on @PSReady:   The ultimate PS5 has an Xbox Series S inside!  My new podcast @TheBackmarkers!  I have a TikTok!  My Twitch channel:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
